resources.string: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Street name # 123 Fracc. Something In Tijuana
This is the place where the cesar salad was invented back in 1958, its right in the center of avenida Revolucion one of the most important turist atractions in the city

Mision 19 is located in an impressive gold LEED certified building. It is beautifully decorated and has private parking. You can reach the restaurant by elevator, just make sure you input the actual floor you are trying to reach before you enter the elevator as there are no buttons inside.

Delicious traditional mexican dishes made with wonderful, fresh ingredients. We had the queso fundido (melted cheese with chorizo), chunky guacamole (with onions and tomato), chilli relleno (very fresh) and awesome chicken mole enchiladas (served with delish rice and beans.)
